entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023
